feed.title: Montreal River Harbour - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Montreal River Harbour
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 7:11 PM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -4.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Wawa Airport 10:00 PM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022
Temperature: -4.5°C
Pressure: 100.6 kPa
Humidity: 91 %
Wind Chill: -10
Dewpoint: -5.7°C
Wind: S 17 km/h gust 28 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow at times heavy mixed with ice pellets. Temperature steady near minus 5.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy becoming mixed with periods of ice pellets before morning. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 5. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 7:43 PM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries mixed with ice pellets. High zero. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries or ice pellets. Risk of freezing drizzle in the afternoon. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. Wind becoming south 20 gusting to 40 near noon. High zero. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning. Forecast issued 7:43 PM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of light snow or rain. Temperature steady near plus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow or ice pellets changing to rain showers near midnight. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near plus 1. Forecast issued 7:43 PM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022
